short_summary: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for the renewal of Sunbird software licenses, maintenance and support, or equivalent, on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) in Ashton, Ontario
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
**Title:** SSC BPM021475 - Sunbird Software Licenses, Maintenance and Support Renewal for DND
**Reference Number:** SSC-24-00026624:T

The Government of Canada, through [Shared Services Canada](https://www.ssc-spc.ca/), is issuing a Request for Quotations (RFQ) for the renewal of Sunbird software licenses, maintenance, and support services on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Background:** The Sunbird software licenses, maintenance, and support services are currently in use by DND and require renewal to ensure continued support and maintenance.

**Details:** This RFQ is for a three-year contract term, with annual milestone payments, commencing on July 1, 2024, and ending on June 30, 2027. The successful bidder will be required to provide:

* Sunbird software licenses
* Maintenance and support services
* Annual milestone payments

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Compliance with the bid solicitation requirements
* Lowest evaluated price

**Bid Submission:** Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the contract authority requires bidders to submit their bids electronically. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

**Important Notice:** The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachments:**

* [Request for Quotations document](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/1473EBF8-5B61-4F36-BD53-E580021A33A6)
* [Attachment 2](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/179646F2-7EAA-4770-8247-A6DF1E3F647D)

**Contact Information:**

* Reyna Teresa Garcia, Tito
* Phone: 343-552-0578
* Fax: 613-960-6026
* Email: [Not provided](mailto:)
* Address: SSC Office 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K2P 2N1

Please visit the [Shared Services Canada website](https://www.ssc-spc.ca/competition) for more information on this RFQ.
